name: tailwindcss-transpiler
description: Compiles your tailwindcss files into pure CSS files. Moreover, you can also use it with SASS
author: Augustin Joseph

tailwindTranspiler.browsersList.description: Add vendor prefixes to unsupported CSS properties (e. g. transform -> -ms-transform). Specify what browsers to target with an array of strings (uses [Browserslist](https://github.com/ai/browserslist)). Pass `null` to turn off.

tailwindTranspiler.minifyOutputFile.description: Check to minify the output file.

tailwindTranspiler.savePath.description:
Set the save location of exported CSS.
 Set the path relative from Workspace Root.
  (NOTE: Folder will be created if does not exist).

tailwindTranspiler.tailwindConfigPath.description:
Set the location of tailwind config file.
 Set the path relative from Workspace Root.

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run build:vscode --prefix ../
